isPopupEvent

public static boolean isPopupEvent(MouseEvent event)
Determines if the given mouse event is a user gesture for opening a popup menu (context menu) - typically this is a single right-click.

Parameters:
event - the event to be tested
Returns:
true == the event indicates a popup menu is to be shown, false == otherwise

public static boolean isOpenDialogEvent(MouseEvent event)
Determines if the given mouse event is a user gesture for opening a dialog - typically double click with left mouse button

Parameters:
event - the event to be tested
Returns:
true == the event indicates a dialog is to be opened, false == otherwise

                                     boolean b)
This method toggles the waiting cursor in the current frame of the specified Component.

Parameters:
component - the component, whose Frame will show the waiting cursor
b - true == show waiting, false == restore previous

enforceOnScreenDisplay

public static void enforceOnScreenDisplay(JPopupMenu popupMenu)
This method ensures the specified popup menu is always displayed within the screen boundary. This feature is currently not enforced by Java(tm).

This methods should be called only once.

popupMenu - the popup menu to be displayed
mev - the MouseEvent which details the location where mouse was clicked

setLocale

public static void setLocale(String localeCode)
Sets the Locale.

This method accepts as an argument the code that would be returned if toString method was called on a Locale. This code is currently defined as: language_country or language_country_variant,
where,
language = lowercase two-letter ISO-639 code
country = uppercase two-letter ISO-3166 code
variant = vendor and browser specific code

Note that each section of the code is delimited by an underscore ( _ ).

For example, en, en_US, and fr_CA would return English, English (US), and French (Canada) respectively. If the parameter is not recognized as a valid Locale, then the system default is used.

Parameters:
localeCode - the code that is returned by Locale.toString method
See Also:
Locale, lowercase two-letter ISO-639 code, uppercase two-letter ISO-3166 code

checkOneExtensionForLayer

public static boolean checkOneExtensionForLayer(Layer layer,
                                                String extension)
This method determines if a layer has the specified extension.

Parameters:
layer - the layer to be checked
extension - the extension name
Returns:
true if the layer has the specified extension

                                              int capability)

Parameters:
layer - the layer
capability - the capability of the layer to be checked
